Portal 2 has an amazing storyline, nice gameplay, and nice co-op. It's super replayable.
I consider Portal 2 a bit overrated, but it's still a very good game.

Игра хорошая. Персонажи Охуеные! Сюжет - интересен. Вообщем игра збс!

I have nearly 600 hours. 

Those hours aren't from perfecting a speedrun, nor from building vast complex levels. They aren't even from me replaying the singleplayer story (which is phenomenal btw, and I definitely have replayed it a handful of times). Instead, those hours come from me casually playing through the vast collection of community made levels.

I simply love the atmosphere and mechanics of this game, and they've added infinite variations of it by supporting the community workshop. Whether you like playing community chambers by yourself or inviting a friend to join in the fun, you can spend hundreds of hours solving puzzles, experiencing custom storylines, and endlessly killing your partner in science.

Great mechanics, great soundtrack, and one hell of a great game.

Good job Valve, love you!<3
Bought it for the popularity factor, stayed for the challenging gameplay.

A much welcomed sequel to Portal, Valve has done it again! An amazing puzzle-solving game with an amazing story line. If you love puzzles and science fiction, you'll love Portal. Fair warning, however: You [b]really should[/b] get and play Portal first. Otherwise, you'll miss a lot of the story. To the devs: Great work, and I look forward to the next entry in this series.
Fun puzzle game and delightfully snarky dialogue.

This has taken the first game and expanded upon it, the story, the humour, all of it is better. Its even longer, adds new mechanics, and is generally just amazing.
It's a classic. if you haven't played this yet, you should do it immediately.

По-моему мнению игра превзошла первую часть игры. Минусов у этой игры мало и есть много плюсов.Очень интересная игра, проходил я ее несколько дней.
Я прошел ее и могу рассказать, как там весь сюжет, но из-за этого вам перехочется в нее играть. Продуманные головоломки и прохождение сквозь порталы. Приятный конец, а уж про Луну я вообще молчу. Игра сделана на 10/10. Всем советую в нее поиграть и уж тем более её пройти. Сейчас таких игр почти нет.
Далее её плюсы и минусы.
Плюсы: Хорошая физика, достаточно хорошая; нужно применять логику, а не просто тыкать на кнопки; хороший саундтрек; интересный сюжет и т.д. Минусы: Я так и не нашёл)))
